about_the_game:
Dive into the world of programming with 'Conge's Crunch Time'!
Become a programmer by solving puzzles with just a mouse pointer.

'Conge's Crunch Time' is a puzzle game where you solve factory tasks by using intuitive Drag&Drop-based programming. In each level, you'll be presented with specific tasks that require logical thinking and problem-solving skills. Write code for your robot to complete these tasks, progress deeper into the factory. As you advance, you'll encounter more complex challenges with new puzzle concepts and data structure creatures.

Become 'Conge', appointed as the head manager to repower the deserted factory. You don't need to do all the hard work by yourself. Use programming blocks to write commands for your robot, and master mysterious data structure creatures like Queue and Stack to manage items. Together, solve complex problems, uncover the truth behind the incidents of the factory, and discover the game-changing technology buried deep within.

Conge's Crunch Time presents...

  • Intuitive Drag&Drop programming for juniors
  • Friendly tutorials for growing employees
  • Over 50 tasks left to-do
  • Skip feature to delegate today's task to your tomorrow
  • Helpful creatures diligently follow commands
  • Extra challenges placed for the experts
  • Special award for efficient employees

... and a highly sarcastic robot assistant.

name: Conge's Crunch Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX950
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960

short_description: 'Conge's Crunch Time' is a puzzle game where you solve factory tasks by using intuitive Drag&Drop-based programming. Write a code for your robot to complete specific tasks for each level, progress deeper into the factory. Meet new puzzle concepts and data structure creatures, and uncover the truth.
